import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Menu, X } from 'lucide-react'; import "./css/contact.css"; import AuthModal from "./AuthModal"; const Contact = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: "", email: "", phone: "", message: "", referral: "", service: "", }); const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false); const [isMenuOpen, setIsMenuOpen] = useState(false); const [scrolled, setScrolled] = useState(false); const [isAuthOpen, setIsAuthOpen] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { const handleScroll = () => { setScrolled(window.scrollY > 50); }; window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); return () => window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); }, []); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setIsSubmitting(true); // Simulate submission delay await new Promise((resolve) => setTimeout(resolve, 1000)); alert(`Thanks ${formData.name}, we'll get back to you soon!`); setFormData({ name: "", email: "", phone: "", message: "", referral: "", service: "", }); setIsSubmitting(false); }; return (
